title: Namma: a Tibetan Love Story
description: In this story of her love and marriage to Tibetan, Tsedup, Kate Karko tells of the plight of the dignified, nomadic Tibetans, as the tale unravels of a girl from the suburbs, who went to live in a tent on the roof of the world. Paperback edition ISBN 0340794631.
author: Kate Karko
